title: CS Competency Enhancement: Social Constructivist E-Book Design for Improving Children's Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and understanding of educational planning
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain a framework for designing e-books to improve child literacy based on socioconstructivist principles.
Learners can apply multimedia integration strategies suitable for various reading development stages to project deliverables.
Learners can complete team projects by designing a collaboration-based digital content production workflow.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
